meanings.def: a large animal kept on farms to produce milk or beef
examples: a herd of dairy cows (= cows kept for their milk)

meanings.def: the female of the elephant, whale and some other large animals
an offensive word for a woman who you do not like
an unpleasant person, thing or situation
to become very angry or anxious about something
examples: Don't have a cow—it's no big deal.

meanings.def: for a very long time; forever
examples: You can talk till the cows come home—you’ll never make me change my mind.

idioms.def: to become very angry or anxious about something
examples: Don't have a cow—it's no big deal.

idioms.def: for a very long time; forever
examples: You can talk till the cows come home—you’ll never make me change my mind.

meanings.def: to frighten somebody in order to make them obey you
examples: be cowed (by somebody/something) She was easily cowed by people in authority.
Two judges have refused to be cowed by pressure from the government.
be cowed into (doing) something They were wrong if they thought she could be cowed into submission by threats.
